method.name: add_service_provider
method.description: Specifies a service provider for which linked accounts should be retrieved. Can be called multiple times to specify multiple service providers.

method.name: clear_service_providers
method.description: Clears the list of services providers that was created by calling [method add_service_provider].

method.name: set_max_users
method.description: This field specifies the maximum number of users that should be returned in the response.

method.name: set_time_window
method.description: This field specifies the time window in seconds for which the linked accounts should be retrieved.
